page.title: 04BO'NESS CUBS
page.content: I am in the Cubs and I like them. We always meet on a Monday at 6.45pm. Our leaders are Baloo, Akela and Bagera. They all respond to the Jungle Book. Baloo is the bear, Akela is the wolf and Bagera is the panther. We have about 36 cubs altogether. Our number is the Third Bo'ness but we are the only cubs in Bo'ness. We play games when all the cubs form a circle and are each given a letter C.U.B.S. which stands for cubs. We put a bean bag in the middle of the circle. Then Akela shouts C. Then everybody with the letter C runs round once and grabs the bean bag. I like learning things that would help me sometimes. We are trained in tracking things down as well. I like going to the cubs.
